REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0605 reute r f BC-AUGAT<AUG>-SEEKS-TO-M 06-19 0056

TEXT.TITLE: AUGAT<AUG> SEEKS TO MAXIMIZE SHAREHOLDER VALUE
TEXT.BODY: Augat Inc said it retained an investment banker, Wertheim Schroeder and Co Inc, to explore possible means for the company to maximize shareholder value. The company said it was not pressured into taking this action by any specific situation or opportunity. Reuter
